description: Capacity Development to Operationalize the Orissa Resettlement and Rehabilitation Policy, 2006.

subproject.corporate outcome: Capacities of national and local institutions enhanced to scale up proven MDG acceleration interventions and to plan, monitor, report and evaluate the MDG progress in the context of related national development priorities
subproject.description: Government of Orissa in partnership with DFID and UNDP extended the project to operationalize the Orissa Resettlement and Rehabilitation (R&R) Policy, 2006 to address the issues arising out of displacement of people due to industrial, mining and irrigation projects. Project focuses to help improve the efficacy of the R&R policy in the State as well as to facilitate its replication in other states with similar developmental context as part of an equitable, inclusive and participatory approach to development.
subproject.gender code: Gender equality as a significant objective
subproject.title: Resettlement and Rehabilitatio
